content: the ade beanie designed by ola ogunlolu gauge 4 sts and 7 row in stockinette needles 10mm us 15 16 circular stitch = 2 x 2 5cm square needles or as needed to match gauge 10 mm double pointed needles / long 10mm circular needle suitable for magic skill level easy loop technique sizing tapestry needle circumference 20 stretches to 25 abbreviations length excluding pom 8 unstretched k knit this beanie will fit the average sized adult p purl head st stich materials sts stitches yarn 1 ball 87 yards / 80 m of wool and the gang s funfetti yarn or any similar k2tog knit 2 stiches together super chunky / super bulky weight yarn pattern using a 10mm circular needle cast on 40 stitches place stitch marker join in the round round 1 7 *k1 p1* to end 40 sts round 8 knit all sts round 9 purl all sts round 10 knit all sts round 11 purl all sts round 12 knit all sts note row 13 to 21 can be worked by following chart on next page or written instructions below round 13 *p9 k1* repeat around round 14 knit all sts round 15 k1 *p7 k3 repeat from * 2 times p7 k2 round 16 knit all sts round 17 k2 *p5 k5 repeat from * 2 times p5 k3 round 18 knit all sts round 19 k3 *p3 k7 repeat from * 2 times p3 k4 round 20 knit all sts round 21 k4 *p1 k9 repeat from * 2 times p1 k5 round 22 - 24 knit all sts begin decrease switch to double pointed needles or magic loop method round 25 *k2 k2tog* to end 30 sts round 26 *k1 k2tog* to end 20 sts round 27 knit all sts 20 sts round 28 k2tog to end 10 sts round 29 knit all sts 10 sts cut yarn leaving an 8 tail using a tapestry needle thread yarn through remaining sts pull tight and secure end weave in ends personalize by adding a tag and/ or pom pom enjoy your beanie share your photos with the hashtags #adebeanie and #therookiehooker and tag me on instagram @therookiehooker chart a rounds 13 21 note this chart only shows the first 20 stiches of each round complete the section shown for each row twice to complete all 40 stiches in ech row return to written instructions to continue from round 22 onwards *you may sell items made from this pattern but please give credit to the original designer no unauthorized reproduction or sharing of this pattern is allowed
